body.p:
Each device in the Monitor’s device chain has a READINGS screen chain, providing power monitoring information.
Select (touch) DEVICES to see the device list and then READINGS.
Use PREVIOUS/NEXT to step through the screen chain.
As an example, READINGS from the PDU are power measurements at input to and output from the PDU transformer ().
Screens for device readings for all devices that can be monitored by the Color Monitor are shown and described in WaveStar® Color Monitor, Setup and Operation, P-164001109.
